explains: vt. 把球挑高；打缓慢的球

sentences.en: Reading the LOB from the database
sentences.cn: 从数据库中读取 LOB 数据

sentences.en: Remarkable is also the effect on LOB data.
sentences.cn: 值得注意的还有对LOB数据的影响。

sentences.en: The response message is returned as binary LOB (BLOB).
sentences.cn: 响应消息作为二进制lob (BLOB)返回。
